author: IGN
description:
The world of the Wall awaits.Here's your first look at Wall World 2 in this reveal trailer for the upcoming sequel to the mining rogue-lite game with tower defense elements. Wall World 2 will be available in 2025. Wall World 2 builds on the mining rogue-lite experience with expanded mechanics, new challenges, and deeper gameplay. Explore procedurally generated mines full of new discoveries and dangers. Extract valuable resources, harness lost technologies, and upgrade your robospider and exosuit to survive against hordes of raging monsters. Venture through incredible biomes and uncover the secrets entombed in the depths of the Wall.

#WallWorld2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Wall World 2 - Humble Games Showcase 2025 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Path of Exile 2: Dawn of the Hunt teaser trailer for a peek at the Dawn of the Hunt content update for the action RPG. The full reveal of the 0.2.0 content update for Path of Exile 2 happens on March 27, 2025. Path of Exile 2's 0.2.0 content update will be available on PC and consoles on April 4, 2025 (12 PM PDT/3 PM EDT).

#PathOfExile2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Path of Exile 2: Dawn of the Hunt - Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Postal 2 VR is coming to Steam VR, Meta Quest, and PS VR2. Check out the Postal 2 VR reveal trailer for this port to VR via a collaboration between Flat2VR Studios and Running with Scissors.

#Postal2VR #Gaming #IGN
title: Postal 2 VR - Official Reveal Trailer | VR Games Showcase March 2025

author: IGN
description:
Here's why Assassin's Creed 2 and Assassin's Creed 3 had the best writing the Assassin's Creed games have ever seen! Articles, YouTube videos, and forum posts agree that Assassin's Creed is in decline, but why? While Assassin’s Creed Odyssey and recent AC games technically offer more content than the PS3 and Xbox 360 eras of Assassin’s Creed, much of what's been released recently feels wooden and underbaked, with the Assassin's Creed story suffering because of it. Assassin's Creed 3 featured a rich, and meticulously crafted story, but from recent games, Ubisoft has traded that level of storytelling for freedom and RPG elements.

#AssassinsCreed #Gaming #Games
title: Why Assassin's Creed 2 and 3 Had the Best Writing the Series Has Ever Seen

author: IGN
description:
In this clip from Nintendo Voice Chat episode 751, the crew once again revisits the idea of an achievement and trophy system hopefully making it to the next generation of the Nintendo Switch 2. Are achievement systems just a gimmick or major missed opportunity for Nintendo? Join Logan Plant, Jada Griffin, Rebekah Valentine, and Seth Macy as they debate both sides of the fence and what they want to see in the Nintendo Switch 2.

#NIntendoSwitch2 #IGN #Gaming
title: Will the Nintendo Switch 2 Get Achievements and Trophies? - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description: Sonic The Hedgehog’s speed is unparalleled, and the only thing on this earth that can outmatch it is his popularity. Few video game characters are as iconic as the blue blur, with his over three decades in the cultural zeitgeist touching every corner of pop culture along the way. From games and comics to TV and blockbuster movies, there’s a dash of Sonic everywhere. But we’re here specifically to celebrate the mainline Sonic game series and pick the very best. As for our criteria: We tried to rank these games based on historical significance, innovation, and how well these games stand the test of time. Some games, like Sonic Adventure 1 and the original Sonic the Hedgehog, are important to the Sonic series and set the foundation for both 2D and 3D Sonic games to follow. But we felt they both didn’t quite hold up as well as their sequels when judged by a modern standard, so they just missed a place on this list. But that doesn’t diminish their relevance and impact on the Sonic franchi
title: The Top 10 Best Sonic Games

author: IGN
description:
Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon: The Super Live celebrates the opening of their North American Tour on March 15th in Austin, TX at Bass Hall.

With book, lyrics and direction by Kaori Miura (Musical: The Prince of Tennis, Tokyo Revengers The Musical), choreography by Satomi Toma, and music by Go Sakabe and KYOHEI, the visually stunning interpretation of Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon: The Super Live follows the stories of Usagi Tsukino, a teenage girl who transforms into the heroic Sailor Moon. Together, with her fellow Sailor Guardians, she battles many dark forces to protect the Earth from evil. This newly staged version of Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon: The Super Live features an all-female Japanese cast: Riko Tanaka (Sailor Moon), Kanon Maekawa (Sailor Mercury), Rei Kobayashi (Sailor Mars), Kisara Matsumura (Sailor Jupiter), Marin Makino (Sailor Venus), Sayaka Okamura (Queen Beryl), Riona Tatemichi (Tuxedo Mask), Ayano Nagasawa (Ensemble), Ayumi Sagisaka (Ensemble), Minami Watanabe (Ensem
title: Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon: The Super Live - Official North American Tour Trailer
